summary: Email correspondence between law enforcement officials discussing plans to subpoena three individuals in connection with the Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The email mentions attempts to contact a person who has been in communication with Ghislaine Maxwell and references Anthony Figueroa's prior deposition.

persons.name: Anthony Figueroa
persons.context: Mentioned as one of three individuals the law enforcement officials plan to subpoena; was previously deposed.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced as someone a person of interest was recently in communications with.

connections.description: Figueroa is being subpoenaed in an investigation involving Maxwell, and the email suggests a potential connection given Maxwell's communications with another person of interest.

events.title: Subpoena planning discussion
events.description: Law enforcement officials discuss and plan to subpoena three individuals, including Anthony Figueroa, in connection with the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

keyFacts: Law enforcement officials are planning to subpoena three individuals, including Anthony Figueroa, who was previously deposed.
One person of interest has made multiple attempts in 2020 to contact another individual who has been in recent communication with Ghislaine Maxwell.
The correspondence involves a detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force coordinating subpoena issuance and service.
The email indicates investigative efforts to locate and serve individuals not in the New York area.
